title: 日本淺草觀音寺一百籤第四十九籤
poem: 正好中秋月,蟾蜍皎潔間,暗雲知何處,故故兩相攀

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是對正圓月光下的清澈與團聚之美的讚頌，暗示在吉利的日子裡，心境清明、親情或友情緊密相依，亦象徵順遂、吉祥。
analysis.en: 這首詩的主題是 the poem celebrates the clarity and harmony of a perfectly round Mid‑Autumn moon, hinting that on fortunate days the heart is bright, bonds—whether family or friendship—are close, and everything proceeds smoothly and auspiciously.
analysis.jp: 這首詩の主題は この詩は、正しい満月の中秋の月の下での清らかさと調和を称賛し、運の良い日に心が明るく、親戚や友情がしっかり結ばれ、すべてが順調で幸運であることを示唆しています。

rag_analysis: According to the poem, the core meaning is to celebrate the clear, harmonious moments under a perfect Mid‑Autumn moon. • The moon itself symbolizes completeness, brightness, and auspiciousness. • The toad, seen in the clear light, represents calmness, purity, and the ability to see clearly. • The absence of dark clouds conveys freedom from obstacles and confusion. • The phrase “兩相攀” (the two cling together) evokes close bonds—family, friends, or lovers—held firmly in a favorable environment. The overall message is one of peace, clarity, and harmonious relationships, suggesting that good fortune and success are assured.
